name: Sodium
description: Rewrites the rendering engine for a huge FPS boost, usually doubling or tripling frames in modded.
vibe: Perfect if you love big builds but hate slideshow mode.
details: Client-side only, but highly recommended for everyone.
Pairs well with Lithium, FerriteCore, and other optimization mods.
Supports most shader packs and resource packs.

name: Lithium
description: Speeds up game logic like AI, physics, and block updates for smoother multiplayer.
vibe: Keeps mob farms and busy spawns from turning into PowerPoint.
details: Server and client both benefit. Great for large farms and mob-heavy builds.

name: FerriteCore
description: Cuts down memory usage from blocks and models, ideal for large modpacks.
vibe: More room for mods, less crying in Task Manager.

name: Krypton
description: Optimizes networking for lower ping and faster chunk loading on servers.
vibe: Helps your connection keep up with your zoomies.

name: GlitchCore
description: General optimization and stability tweaks for Fabric-based modpacks.
vibe: Makes the whole stack a little less cursed.

name: Athena
description: Improves performance for detailed block models from decorative mods.
vibe: Let your builds be extra without tanking FPS.

name: Moonlight Lib
description: Library mod that powers several worldgen and structure mods.
vibe: You don’t see it, but your landscapes do.

name: Balm
description: Shared code used by multiple QoL mods like Traveler’s Backpack.
vibe: The glue holding some of your favorite toys together.

name: TerraBlender
description: Lets biome mods like Biomes O’ Plenty plug into world generation cleanly.
vibe: The reason your world is more than just plains, plains, and more plains.

name: Traveler’s Backpack
description: Wearable backpacks with their own inventory UI and upgrades.
vibe: Never choose between building blocks and snacks again.

name: Carry On
description: Pick up chests, furnaces, and mobs with your bare hands.
vibe: Rearrange your base like it’s interior design simulator.

name: AppleSkin
description: Shows food values and saturation directly on your HUD.
vibe: Finally understand what that suspicious stew is really doing.

name: JourneyMap
description: Fullscreen map, minimap, waypoints, and death markers.
vibe: IRL GPS but for getting lost in modded terrain.

name: Waystones
description: Place or discover stones you can warp between instantly.
vibe: Fast travel for people with 40 unfinished bases.

name: Decorative Blocks Reborn
description: Adds beams, seats, pillars, supports, and more decorative blocks.
vibe: Make every cottage-core fantasy real.

name: Macaw’s Furniture
description: Tables, chairs, wardrobes, desks, and a ton of decor pieces.
vibe: Your base stops looking like a cave and starts looking like a home.

name: Chipped
description: Thousands of new block variants using a custom crafting station.
vibe: If you’ve ever said “I wish this block had 50 more versions,” this is for you.

name: Critters & Companions
description: Cute animals like otters, koi, dragonflies, snails, and more.
vibe: Maximum cozy vibes, minimum jump scares.

name: Bosses of Mass Destruction
description: Adds unique boss fights like the Nether Gauntlet, Void Blossom, and more.
vibe: For when the Wither just isn’t scary anymore.

name: Deeper and Darker
description: Adds The Otherside, a sculk-themed dimension tied to the Warden.
vibe: You chose horror mode voluntarily. Brave.

name: Biomes O’ Plenty
description: 60+ new biomes with unique foliage, blocks, and vibes.
vibe: Touch grass, but like, modded grass.

name: Hopo Better Mineshafts
description: Turns mineshafts into sprawling mining networks worth exploring.
vibe: Finally, mines that feel like someone actually worked there.

name: Hopo Better Underwater Ruins
description: Upgrades ocean ruins with bigger layouts and better loot.
vibe: Less empty ocean, more “oh no what’s that.”

name: YUNG’s Better Strongholds
description: Strongholds become full-on dungeons with loops and secrets.
vibe: The End portal room is now an actual journey.

name: YUNG’s Better Nether Fortresses
description: Makes Nether fortresses huge, complex, and loot-filled.
vibe: Speedrunners fear it, explorers love it.

name: Structory
description: Sprinkles small and mid-sized structures throughout the overworld.
vibe: Little surprises around every hill.

name: Simple Voice Chat
description: Proximity and group voice chat directly in Minecraft.
vibe: Hear your friends scream in real time.

name: Gravestones
description: Keeps your items safe in a grave when you die.
vibe: Less rage quitting when you fall in lava (again).

name: Just Enough Items (JEI)
description: Search recipes and item uses right from your inventory.
vibe: No more alt-tabbing to figure out that one weird recipe.
